name: Eduarda Portel
summary: Enthusiast about data, statistics, and problem-solving. Always learning new technologies.

experience.description: Assisting customers with software solutions, providing technical support, and ensuring customer satisfaction.

projects.name: Localiza Eureka
projects.description: Python app developed for Instituto Mauá de Tecnologia’s Eureka event, enabling real-time location of rooms and stands via interactive map.

projects.name: Galactic Harmony
projects.description: Astronomical data analysis and visualization in Tableau, exploring galaxy mass, brightness, and redshift with interactive dashboards.

projects.name: CodeQuiz
projects.description: Interactive educational app to teach Python basics through dynamic quizzes, designed with beginner accessibility in mind.

projects.name: Institutional Website – Missão Ambiental
projects.description: Responsive website for NGO Missão Ambiental – Ipiranga, providing access to social projects, contact, and promotion of environmental initiatives.
